mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, USE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS INSERT_DT, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_DT FROM USER WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER( ID, NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, DEPT_ID, USE_YN, ENTER_DT, INSERT_DT, UPDATE_DT )VALUES( #{userId}, #{userNm}, #{empNo}, #{email}, #{deptId}, #{useYn}, STR_TO_DATE(#{enterDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), NOW(), NOW() )
